title: T 206 Cubs Evers and Chance wanted
author: rkastner

posts.post_title: T 206 Cubs Evers and Chance wanted
posts.post_content:
I have a Tinkers but need an Evers portrait and Chance portrait. I want to matte and frame them to honor the famous Double play combination. I would prefer the condition to match my Tinkers. Thanks so much for reading this. Hopefully someone can come up with my request.
Ron

Sorry I just figured out that I should have posted in a different section of this site. Please accept my apologies.

I can appreciate your double play combination but not to be rude but this should really be posted in BST and not on the main page.  I am not. T206 person but this is how I gor started on my T207 Cubs  subset.  Started with Tinker and Chance then I found out that Evers does not exist in T207.  Now I have all 10 cards of T207 and working on back types.
I know but can't figure out how to delete, sorry

[quote name="rkastner" post=1462598]I know but can't figure out how to delete, sorry[/QUOTE]

Leon or one of the moderators could probably move it for you if you contact them.  Good luck in your quest and Go Cubs Go!  FlytheW!
